tswitem.name: Signet of Riposte
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Riposte
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: When you block, evade or are glanced, you gain a beneficial effect which increases your Critical Chance and Penetration Chance by 6%/12%/18% for 2 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
